reviews.sentence: If you are in the area a great place to eat play and stay. A great hotel stay especially with Rewards Points. Easy location from Tampa Airport. Great restaurants including Hard Rock Cafe Green Room Cafe and Buffet. Friendly hotel and casino staff. Beautiful pool area palm trees private cabanas and fun polside bar. Decor features Hard Rock memorabilia. A must if you enjoy casinos and are in the Tampa area.

Fun at the Tampa Hard Rock. This had been one of my many visits to the Tampa Hard Rock Casino. I enjoy the Casino part alot of slots many tables. If you do not want to gamble you have the spa pool music relaxing bars for drinks and many great places to eat. You are treated like a special person.

No Gamblimg at The Hard Rock. It is never a gamble to choose the Seminole Hard Rock Tampa for a wonderful 5star stay at its hotels. Not only are the accommodations and staff superior but the restaurants are beyond compare. For example Council Grove known for its steaks has the best cuisine we have ever eaten. The hotel pool area is lovely. You do not have to gamble to have a great experience. There is first class entertainment opportunities to dance and a first class spa. The Hard Rock Tampa is always an adventure in luxury.

Expensive Night Out but Thoroughly Enjoyed it. Nice little touches in room like turn down service with chocolate guitars Keurig coffee maker nice towels. I asked for a late check out and was given 10 pm which was great. Food at Hard Rock and bakery cafe was good. Pool area was very nice with great towelsVery expensive room rates for a casino hotel.

I love the casino well i had. i know staff well and most are friendly but my last few experiences consistently have not been and for Becky a bartender who works early morning pool bar. bad bad bad. First experience by pool bar and my last. She was rude uninviting no sense of urgency and rude once again. I WILL NEVER GO TO POOL BAR IN MORNING OR EVEN WANT TO EXPERIENCE THE POOL WITH FRIENDS OR BAR BECAUSE OF THIS EXPERIENCE. I have a few bad experiences consistently at casino the past 4 times and I do not want to give it ago again. but I am sure that I am done with going there and bringing friends from tampa and from out of town. I will recommend a little hole in wall bar that plays poker pool tv and awesome bartenders then the casino.

Amazing and Kid Friendly. Hard Rock Tampa really knows how to train their staff in providing FIRST CLASS SERVICE. I came to the hotel with 2 teenagers for spring break. They welcomed us with smiles as soon as we pulled up to the door. They helped us carry our things to the room and made us feel very special. The pool and hot tub were amazing and all the pool staff employees were wonderful. Everyone treated the kids like VIPS and they want to come back soon. The best part was the chocolate guitars delivered to our room. totally surprised us. I have never had such a great hotel experience like this before. well worth the money.

I started visiting the Hardrock Tampa 10years ago whilst on vacation The food is fantastic and getting better I now live here and hit a nice jackpot last year I do not visit as much but my husband and I always have a good date night ever so often. We have stayed at the hotel complimentary rooms and staff was wonderful rooms were great my kids love the pool and the buffet Thanks for making these New Yorkers feel welcome.

Must stop even for a few minutes. Surprising open casino and great places to eat too. The hotel beautiful. Parking available. Upscale restaurants as well as fast food. Beautiful pool and amenities. Smoking areas can be a problem but there are some areas where it is better. Live music party atmosphere.

Great Place to Stay and Gamble. But Watch Out for the Construction. Beautiful Room on the 11th floor but lookout for the construction noise that starts at 80 am Fun Gambling. love the High Limit Room and the VIP area that we were able to enjoyGod Food at the Hard Rock CaféWe traveled on a Monday Tuesday and Wednesday so it was not too crowded and the pool was BEAUTIFUL.

Staying at the Hotel. I have been to the Hard Rock Tampa Casino many times in the past but this time for my Birthday I got offered a room and I wanted to share this with you. We were surprised with a King Suite on the 12th Floor one draw back is it was facing the I4 highway not so great but really there is no perfect view at this Hotel. If you can get a Suite Do it as you will see by the pictures it is magnificent. It has a Living area A Sitting Area A Bar Coffee Area and the Bathroom offered both a Private Toilet as well as a Large Stall Shower and Jacuzi Tub that could dit two adults the cool part was that the tub had a sliding glass wall into the Living Room. It had a Large Double Sink with all the Shampoo you needed. I was alitle surprised that we did not receive turn down service as this is a usual feature with Suites Even The Beau Rivage gives you that in a standard Room and before you question we did not have the do not disturb sign on. All in all a Beautiful Room and it was so different from going and leaving the same night. And when your there please eat at Grey Salt you will Not be disappointed and before we left for home we ate breakfast at The Rise their Dueces Wild Breakfast Gives you everything you want Eggs Bacon Sausage French Toast and Breakfast Potatoes yum. So we left full and Happy and looking forward to going back.

Hard Rock in Tampa rocks. There is construction that is ongoing. If you can do without a pool it is an awesome place when they finalize their project it will be awesome. Rooms are very big well appointed. Close to airport but no plane noise. Excellent staff.

Ok for short stay only as at present no pool. Most of the staff were friendly and good choice of eateries. Beds comfortable. Enjoyed the rock memorabilia on walls. Forgot my room key and had to be escorted by two members of staff to my room as had no ID on me. Made me feel a little like a criminal. The receptionist staff took a photo copy of my passport on check in so surely could have looked at that instead to make it less intimidating. Also no pool due to reconstruction which I was not aware of and not advised about.

did not meet expectations. I have been going to the hardrock for years. I had always wanted to stay in one of the rooms and finally had the opportunity. Unfortunately I was not impressed at all. The room was just OK and the decor was terrible. It looked like stepped back into a 70s with the drab brown colors and wood panel counters. We slept horrible because the walls are paper thin. You could literally hear people talking in the room next to us and talking in the hall. We were woken up at 3AM by loud talking in the hall and at 6AM our neighbor was playing loud music. So needless to say the room experience was very disappointing. The buffet is always good. I very much disliked the Rise Kitchen. They served a mimosa with orange juice full of pulp. If I had paid full price for that room I would have been pretty angry. The non smoking part of the casino is great. I miss the pool bar too.

Well I will give this place another review after our 3 day stay. But we will be visiting in 3 weeks already annoyed. We have been so looking forward to 3 days of gambling eating drinking and relaxing by the pool. What a surprise we got AFTER we paid and made our reservation. At the bottom of our printed receipt in small print it states that the pool is under construction and closed. Nothing on the Web site. Are you kidding. Surely they will compensate us somehow. So I called them. The associate put me on hold to ask her supervisor. She came back and told me there would be no compensation or free meal or anything. But she did suggest that we go the the South Florida Hard Rock Casino because it is nicer and cheaper. Are you kidding me. I will update you after our visit.

Lovely hotel casino but construction now. Beautiful hotel and casino. It ’s quite large. Currently there ’s construction going on as the hotel is expanding. During this period the pool and fitness center are closed. The spa also has reduced facilities until they move into the new tower. We still enjoyed our stay and were not bothered by any construction noise. Pool and fitness center closed during construction. Lots of smoke in casino but there is a smoke free area.

casino. worst slot machines in the country. Remodel is very confusing. Could not find anything. Pool was a lot nicer before remodel. Confusing parking. Poor conditions for disabled older adults. Very few non smoking slots.

Very disappointed. Called front desk for issues to reach manager three times. Then told they would call me back. They did not. Called Customer care they said put in writing my concerns still no call back. I do not recommend this place. Over charged for food that was incorrect valet was not valet for 25 a car. Toilet ran all night music outside in pool area for two hours I was trying to work you could not hear anything. Poor service Valet people called front desk workers Liars. Still waiting on someone to get back to me on charges that are incorrect.

Make sure you book the East Tower. If you stay in the West Tower old building prepare to walk through the casino in your bathing suit to access the pool area. Also pool closes at sunset so winter months will not be worth it. Go to valet and drop off bags or it is a LONG walk from parking garage to hotel check. in.

Super awesome experience. Stayed for a couple nights at the hotel and had a blast. The staff was super helpful the pool was super clean and felt so good. The people attending to the pool area went above and beyond in terms of customer service. Hotel room design was super awesome but we found old paper towels and wipes under the counter which was a big let down. Other than that a great experience.

Great room recently renovated. We stayed at a recently renovated hotel room for a night. The hotel amenities like the gym and pool were closed due to the continuing renovations on the property. Very nice room awesome shower and bathroom area. Some nice and fresh flowers in the room upon entry. Free wi fi was available. I do believe you have to pay for parking however I know they also offer valet.

Hotel is beautiful room top notch casino fantastic the restaurants is another story for the price you charge I was expecting great food instead I got burned bread on club sand in pool bar in the deli grouper was so overcooked it was dry and dark brown crust fried rice was dry and tasteless but plentiful food court was awful pizza all bread no taste general chicken all breading and tasteless loved hotel but next time will definitely will eat outside hotel.

Road noise and smells of smoke everywhere. Very noisy by the pool due to road noise room and corridors stank of stale smoke made our clothes stinkRom nice but smoke smell was really bad. Noise from road smell of smoke.

Smoking is HORRIBLE. All of the food places are surrounded by smoke. My eyes burn my clothes real and I can not breath. There is literally no place to sit but at a machine. Currently sitting ON THE FLOOR in the lobywaiting to check into my room. Layout is horrible. Pool does not have a single wow factor. Not impressed at all. we have stayed at several Hard rocks in clouding San Diego Biloxi and Hollywood FL and this one is the worst.
I had lunch at the pool bar restaurant. Had a club sandwich and waffle fries. They both good. No waiting at all. Waitress was pleasant and good at her job. Will go back.
Service was aweful. Ca n’t eat by pool. And too Smokey in casinos.
